title: IoT-Based Data Management and Analysis Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer proficiency and foundational mathematical knowledge
context.additional_context: Hands-on training using IoT equipment virtual simulations in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: They can explain the fundamental operating principles of IoT system components (sensors, edge/cloud)
They can design sensor data collection and transmission processes using virtual IoT devices
They can analyze patterns in collected data using cloud-based data visualization tools
Through collaboration, they can design IoT problem-solving scenarios and develop implementation plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
